hero.heading: Hey! I'm Dayim
hero.description: I'm a MERN stack developer with a passion for web and app development , IoT projects, and hosting solutions. I enjoy blending software, hardware, and deployment strategies to create innovative, real-world solutions.

about.description: I create modern web solutions, mobile apps, and IoT integrations that solve real-world problems. My work focuses on turning complex challenges into user-friendly applications and connected devices. Whether you need a dynamic web app, a sleek mobile app, or an IoT system, Iâ€™m here to bring your ideas to life.

allExperience.companyDescription: At Sazgenix, I contributed to developing and optimizing web applications and backend systems. My role involved creating intuitive user interfaces, enhancing system performance, and ensuring robust, scalable solutions. I collaborated closely with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality products that meet client needs.

During my time as a Python Developer at NIELIT, I focused on building and optimizing Python-based applications and scripts. My work included developing efficient backend services, automating tasks, and improving system performance. I collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver scalable, high-quality solutions tailored to meet specific project requirements. My experience also involved integrating various APIs, working with data processing pipelines, and ensuring code quality through testing and debugging.

allTestimonial.reviewText: Working with Dayim was an absolute pleasure. He brought a level of expertise and dedication that truly elevated our project. From the start, Dayim demonstrated a deep understanding of our needs and delivered solutions that exceeded our expectations. Their ability to turn complex problems into seamless, efficient applications was remarkable. The attention to detail and commitment to quality he showed made a significant impact on our success. I highly recommend Dayim for anyone looking for a reliable and skilled developer.

Partnering with Dayim was one of the best decisions we made for our project. His in-depth knowledge and skillset in software development was truly impressive. Dayim's consistently delivered high-quality work, often going above and beyond to ensure that every aspect of the project was flawless. Their ability to understand our vision and translate it into a functional and polished product was remarkable. I highly recommend Dayim to anyone seeking a talented and dependable developer.

Dayim is a hard working developer and passionate software enthusiast. In my experience with working with Dayim, I've found him to be extremely responsive, calculated and punctual. I would recommend Dayim for companies and individuals looking to hire a good software/web developer for their projects.

Mr Dayim is having a great skill in cutting edge technologies like software development and machine learning. He always work towards his goals in effective and efficient manners. Working with Mr Dayim in CodeSquads have been always a learning experience fo me.
allTestimonial.avatarCompany: Team Lead for Automation at Global PayExSoftware Engineer
